ygData.subject: Re: You won't believe this crap
ygData.msgSnippet: Aradune doesn t wield a Soul Fire...he has the Fiery Avenger, which, althought the stats have never really bee seen, can apparently be used by a ranger. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Aradune doesn't wield a Soul Fire...he has the Fiery
Avenger, which, althought the stats have never really
bee seen, can apparently be used by a ranger.

--- "John E. Maynus" <jmaynus@...> wrote:
> I can't believe the screen shot I saw on
> www.eqvault.com it was a pic of
> Brad's character dead. It wasn't the being dead
> part I couldn't believe but
> what it was he had in his hand. Now remember his
> character is a Ranger, pic
> shows him wearing the new Ranger armor but in his
> hand was the SoulFire
> which is a Pally only weapon. Can we say cheating?
> Now if one of us tried
> that crap we'd get banned from the game but he can
> wield a Pally only weapon
> when he's a Ranger?
> That shows me the ppl like Brad and GM can get away
> with anything in the
> game. I also read on the EQ newsgroup that last
> Sunday the night of the
> events that the GM's were doing things that they've
> told players not to do
> and if they did they'd get banned for it. Heard
> they were camping at zone
> points waiting for a player to zone over and kill
> them and also camping
> binding points and killing someone over and over
> everytime he/she died and
> came back at their bind point till they got ticked
> and pulled the plug on
> their modems. If we would do that junk we'd get
> banned for it.
> Can't wait to hear what Brad has to say about him
> wielding a SoulFire.
>
> **************************
> Azor Spellbound
> Lvl 24 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> **************************
>
>
<HR>
<html>
>


=====
=OrBS=Seriphos

"Everyday, someone's gotta pay"
